#Text=European football : Real Madrid wins third consecutive Champions League beating Liverpool 3-1
#Text=Tuesday , May 29 , 2018
#Text=On Saturday , Spanish football club Real Madrid defeated English side Liverpool 3 – 1 in Ukrainian capital Kiev , to win their third consecutive UEFA Champions League trophy .
#Text=Two goals from Gareth Bale and one from Karim Benzema led Real Madrid to win their thirteenth European title victory .
#Text=Real Madrid dominated the match in ball possession .
#Text=Real Madrid won an early free-kick , in the first minute as Liverpool 's Dejan Lovren committed soon after the start of the game .
#Text=Liverpool 's attack had multiple attempts for the goal early in the first fifteen minutes , none crossing the goal line .
#Text=In the eighteenth minute , Liverpool 's defender Virgil van Dijk missed a chance to score a close-range header .
#Text=Liverpool 's Mohamed Salah was substituted off in the 30th minute after a tackle by Madrid 's captain Sergio Ramos .
#Text=Salah , who had scored 44 goals for the English side in all competitions this season , was later taken to a hospital because of a shoulder injury .
#Text=The Egyptian was replaced by Adam Lallana .
#Text=Just seven minutes later , Real made their first change in the game , as Nacho replaced Dani Carvajal who was also substituted off due to injury .
#Text=The first half ended with 0 – 0 on the scoreboard .
#Text=Three minutes into the second half , Isco almost gave Madrid the lead with his shot on goal , but it hit the goal post .
#Text=In the 51st minute , Frenchman Karim Benzema scored the first goal of the match , but the lead was short-lived .
#Text=Four minutes later , Sadio Mané scored an equaliser for Liverpool , from Dejan Lovren 's assist .
#Text=Gareth Bale was substituted on for Isco .
#Text=The Welshman came on in the 61st minute , and three minutes later , Bale scored an overhead goal , assisted by Marcelo .
#Text=Mané came close to score another equaliser in the 70 minute , but his shot deflected off the post .
#Text=He was later booked in the 82nd minute for a bad foul , which was the only yellow card issued in the match .
#Text=A minute later , Bale added a third goal for the defending champions .
#Text=Liverpool 's goalkeeper Loris Karius tried to block the goal , but could not keep the ball away from the net .
#Text=The match ended after four minutes of added time after 90 minutes of play .
#Text=After the match , Jürgen Klopp spoke about Salah 's injury saying , " It 's a serious injury , a really serious injury . "
#Text=Klopp said Salah was " in the hospital for an X-ray .
